#version 450

layout(location = 0)out vec4 albedoBuffer;
layout(location = 1)out vec3 posBuffer;
layout(location = 2)out vec3 normalBuffer;

struct Material{
        vec3 ambient_albedo;
        vec3 diffuse_albedo;
        vec3 specular_albedo;
        float shininess;
        vec2 pad;
};

layout(std140)uniform MaterialBuffer{
        Material materialBuffer[10];
};

in Vertex{
	vec3 pos;
	vec3 normal;
	vec4 color;
}inVertex;

void main(){
	albedoBuffer = abs(inVertex.color);
	posBuffer = inVertex.pos;
	normalBuffer = inVertex.normal;
	
}
